alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Guadalupe County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 28 at 4:45PM MST until November 29 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, West Central Mountains, Southwest Mountains, Central Highlands, and Guadalupe County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Guadalupe County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains
